name: Racing In Traffic
description: You drive your car in cockpit view through the endless traffic and realistic environment. Go as fast as possible, overtake traffic cars, earn coins and buy new cars. Eventually, become the king of the global leaderboards. Racing In traffic takes the endless racing genre to a whole new level by adding a full career mode, first person view perspective, best in class graphics and real life car sounds. The essence of smooth arcade racing is still there but in the shell of the next generation. Drive your car in the endless highway roads overtaking the traffic, upgrade and buy new cars to beat the missions in career mode.  Now it is time to hit the roads with a car.  FEATURES - Easy to learn and drive - 3D realistic cockpit view - Endless game mode - Different locations and cars to choose - Simulator-like controls - First person camera view - various cars to choose from - Real carsounds recorded from real cars - Detailed environments with day and night variations - Career mode with limitless missions - Online leaderboards and 30+ achievements - Support for english
